content: Phase 1: Service Decomposition & Complexity Reduction - Create BaseService and extract CompetitorAnalysisService components
Extract VisualProcessingService from VisualAnalysisService - color analysis and image processing
Extract VisualIntelligenceService from VisualAnalysisService - logo detection and visual insights
Create VisualAnalysisOrchestrator to coordinate all visual services
Phase 3: Performance Optimization - Redis caching, connection pooling, async processing
Write comprehensive tests for caching and performance services
Integrate existing Redis caching layer with visual analysis services
Implement async processing for heavy operations
